thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au
thread.title: Gordana

author: Gordana
title: Gordana
text:
Having recently found myself in a position where I had to sell some concert tickets I had purchased through Ticketmaster, I thought I would give the Ticketmaster Resale a try.
My tickets were sold within a day or so and the rest of the transaction with Ticketmaster Resale went very smoothly.
The only thing I do not agree with is that Ticketmaster Resale cancel your tickets once they are sold (and issue new ones to the buyer) but do not refund you until after the event takes place.
Overall, it was a positive experience and I would consider using them again if needed.
